job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: stronguPosition Summary What Youll DobrbrustrongIf youre thinking scale think bigger and dont stop there At Walmart Labs we dont just innovate we enable transformations across stores and different channels for the Walmart experience Take a regular day at Walmart Labs and match that with 260 million customers a week 11695 stores under 59 banners in 28 countries and ecommerce websites in 11 countries Thats Walmart Labs for youbrbrWe innovate to deliver a simple and seamless experience for our customers Our tech talent solves the biggest and most complex problems They drive digital transformation where data and analytics are enabling us to better serve our customers and create a digital relationship with them As our customers evolve and adapt we are taking it a few notches further here Were changing what customers can expect from the experience of shopping from the physical stores to mobile social and even online were not just ready for the future of shopping were creating itbrbruOur Ideal CandidatebrbruYou have a deep interest and passion for technology You love writing and owning codes and enjoy working with people who will keep challenging you at every stage You have strong problem solving analytic decisionmaking and excellent communication with interpersonal skills You are selfdriven and motivated with the desire to work in a fastpaced resultsdriven agile environment with varied responsibilitiesbrbrYoull sweep us off our feet ifbrulliYou have proficiency in machine learning algorithms such as multiclass classifications decision trees support vector machines time series forecasting deep learning and anomaly detectionliliYou have a strong understanding of probability and statistical models generative and descriptive modelsliliHandson experience building large scale optimization models Linear Programming Integer Programming etcliliAbility to run experiments scientifically and analyze resultsliliAbility to effectively communicate technical concepts and results to technical and business audiences in a comprehensive mannerliliAbility to collaborate effectively across multiple teams and stakeholders including analytics teams development teams product management and operationsliliStrong CS fundamentals in algorithms data structures and functional programmingliliStrong Experience with Big Data processing SparkBigQueryliliProductionize the developed Machine Learning solutionsliliHands on Experience with Azure Cloud and DatabricksliliStrong background in ML algorithms for time series forecastingliliStrong background in StatisticsliliFamiliarity with Deep Learning algorithmsliliExpert knowledge and experience with PythonliliScripting skills in at least one of the following Shell Perl Python Bash or RubyliliExperience with Performance Engineering including testing tuning and monitoring toolsbrliulstronguYoull Make An Impact BybrustrongulliUnderstands and translates business and functional needs into AIML problem statementsliliBuild complex data sets from multiple data sources both internally and externallyliliDevelop custom data models to drive innovative business solutions to increase revenue and membershipliliSift and analyze data from multiple angles looking for trends that highlight problems or opportunitiesliliUse strong business acumen as well as an ability to communicate findings and mine vast amounts of data for useful insightsliliApply innovative and scientificquantitative approaches to draw conclusions and make recommendations to answer business objectivesliliDesign coordinate and implement data driven business and technology solutions to support innovation initiativesliliCommunicate complex models analysis and recommendations in a clear and precise mannerliliProvide thought leadership in statistical modeling and machine learning AI NLP and Deep Learning are the two focus areasliliDeliver actionable insights to stakeholders through rich visualization and presentationliliManage priorities between research and deliverables effectivelyliliCollaborate actively with topic owners to understand and develop advanced analytics  data sciencebrliulstronguAbout The TeambrbrustrongThe Data Strategy amp Insights organization at Walmart provides Data Foundation Infrastructure Visualization Portal Machine Learning Platform Customer platform and Data Science products that form part of core platforms and services that drive Walmart business The group also develops analytical products for several verticals like Marketing Finance Supply chain Pricing Customer HR etc Our team is responsible for creating and internalizing data science solutions for Walmart customers across the Globe and shopping in various ways like in BrickandMortar Store dot com mobile etc The team is responsible for time critical business critical and highly reliable solutions and products that influence Walmart business The team is spread over multiple locations and we work towards providing the best experience to our customersbrbruBenefits amp PerksbrbruBeyond competitive pay you can receive incentive awards for your performance Other great perks include 401k match stock purchase plan paid maternity and parental leave PTO multiple health plans and much morebrbrstronguAbout WalmartbrbrustrongJoin Walmart and your work could help over 265 million global customers live better every week Yes we are the Fortune 1 company But youll quickly find were a company who wants you to feel comfortable bringing your whole self to work A career at Walmart is where the worlds most complex challenges meet a kinder way of life Our mission spreads far beyond the walls of our stores Join us and youll discover why we are a world leader in diversity and inclusion sustainability and community involvement From day one youll be empowered and equipped to do the best work of your lifebrbrstronguMinimum QualificationsbrbrustrongememOutlined below are the required minimum qualifications for this position If none are listed there are no minimum qualifications brbrememOption 1 Bachelors degree in Statistics Economics Analytics Mathematics Computer Science Information Technology or related field and 2brbryears experience in an analytics or related field Option 2 Masters degree in Statistics Economics Analytics Mathematics Computer SciencebrbrInformation Technology or related field Option 3 4 years experience in an analytics or related field Preferred QualificationsbrbrememOutlined below are the optional preferred qualifications for this position If none are listed there are no preferred qualifications brbrememData science machine learning optimization models Masters degree in Machine Learning Computer Science Information Technology Operations Research Statistics Applied Mathematics Econometrics Successful completion of one or more assessments in Python Spark Scala or R Using open source frameworks for example scikit learn tensorflow torch Primary Location350 N SAINT PAUL ST DALLAS TX 752014240 United States of America
